message: Let's start with a fair split. You can try to do better next round!
You rejected my first offer, now it's your turn to do better!
You could have taken the fair split last round, but I'm willing to give you a bit more this time. Don't expect it to get any better!
I'm not falling for the 'don't expect it to get any better' trick. I'll take a slightly better deal this time.
You've been playing hard to get, now it's time to make a serious offer. Take it or leave it!
You're really pushing your luck with this one. I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
You've been pushing me to the wall, now it's time to make a serious concession. Take it or leave it!
I'm not backing down now. You've been making some pretty extreme offers, time to meet me halfway
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
You've made your last offer, now I'll make mine. Don't say I didn't warn you!
You wanted to take all the money? Fine. I'll give it to me.
You've made it clear you're not willing to share. Fine, I'll take it all. Game over.
